name: Rogue Desktop
description:
This game was made in my spare time in the span of a week for the 7DRL game jam, and although I didn't manage to submit it in time, I'd still like to release it as a stand-alone game.

Fight monsters, sacrifice them to altars and avoid spikes in the dungeon hiding inside your desktop screen all along!

Controls

  • WASD - Arrow keys: Movement
  • Space - Mouse: Attack

Good luck and have fun! Your desktop hides more than you think
